import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; export const Modal = ({title, id}) => { //const [showUser,setShowUser] = useState(true); const [showFile,setShowFile] = useState(false); const [sendList,setSendList] = useState(0); const closeModal = () => { console.log ("closeModal"); } const handlerSendList = () => { console.log (sendList); if(sendList==0){ setSendList(1); setShowFile(true); } else{ setSendList(0); setShowFile(false); } } return ( <>
{title}
); };
